The '''Maison Ordalie''' is the governmental organization responsible for the management of the judicial system of [[Fontaine]].<ref>[[Loading Screen]]: Fontaine<br>''The Maison Ordalie manages Fontaine's judicial system, and the Chief Justice of Fontaine, known as the Iudex, is Neuvillette.''</ref> It is led by the incumbent Chief Justice of Fontaine, [[Neuvillette]].
